page.title: 19Events
page.content: Our village market is near the school and is held in the car park of the Baker's Arms.When it first came the market was quite busy and we asked the men who owned the stalls to answer some questions.Most of the stalls were busy except for the carpet seller and the pots and pans.One of the busiest were the meat sellers and jewellery stall.In the morning it's not so busy but in the afternoon it's busier.Some of the men are not happy because they don't have many customers but some are very busy. The Baker's Arms is near to the school so we didn't have far to walk.The best stall was the jewellery stall,the man was very funny.There were many people in our village market We have few markets in Ta'rgwaith but we have boot sales. In boot sales they sell second-hand things,but in the market they sell jewellery too.
